Body: Look for papers on multi-word term recognition or automatic term recognition, etc. In English, the most common patterns are [Noun*][Noun] and [Adjective*][Noun]. For a recent-ish survey of the field see A Comparative Evaluation of Term Recognition Algorithms . See the paper An Improved Automatic Term RecognitionMethod for Spanish for examples of POS patterns that the authors used, for detecting multi-word terms in Spanish.
